Laredo.XHMW-FM:
XHMW-FM (branded as Stereo Vida) is a Spanish Contemporary Music format FM station that serves the Laredo, Texas, United States and Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, Mexico border area.


== History ==
XHMW received its concession in March 1987. It was owned by Información Radiofónica, S.A., a Radiorama affiliate.
